body.head: NNA019480

p.note: Here the story is resumed at the time when he leaves his brother (see Publications of the Jesup North Pacific Expedition, Vol. X, pp. 195, 210).

body.p: Q!āʼnēqīᵋlax̣ᵘ started. He saw Shaman, and he saw his fire. The fire was in the woods. He saw his ring of red cedar-bark, and he saw his wood-worms. Q!āʼnēqīᵋlax̣ᵘ was afraid, and he went past behind him.
